*Perhaps not complete fantasy. The account I offer here is concordant with a recent review of the
molecular details of the bacterial flagellum. See Howard C. Berg, “The Rotary Motor of Bacterial
Flagella,” Annual Review of Biochemistry, 72, 2003, 19–54. (For this reference, I’m indebted to Mel
Simon.)
